items.text:
You are eligable to move to the {Title} level.

body.text: A new Quest has been added to Adoptify.

items.text: Open the app to find out more.

body.text: Enter a unique redemption code/instructions for the user to redeem this reward.

body.placeholder: Enter optional redemption code or instructions for the user, if required.
Please specify an appropriate reason for denying this reward.
body.errorMessage: Reason for denying reward is required.

body.text: Your request to redeem this reward was denied.
Your request to redeem this reward was rejected.
See your updated stats since you completed this quest.
You've not visited Adoptify for a while.

items.text: Check it regularly to see if you've won rewards, earned badges or moved up the leaderboard.

body.text: You've not visited Adoptify for a while.

items.text: Check it regularly to see if you've earned badges or moved up the leaderboard.

body.text: {User} has indicated they have completed quest '{Title}'.

items.text: Please approve or reject completion of this quest.
